price: (Uwo muntu ugiye gupfa) naba ari mu bantu b’iburyo,
arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā in kāna min aṣḥābi al-yamīni
